Name: capacity_respected
Description: Total task effort must not exceed available capacity.

Name: mandatory_high_severity_blockers_addressed
Description: High-severity blockers must be resolved before release.

Name: stories_have_acceptance_criteria
Description: Only consider user stories with defined acceptance criteria.

Name: team_is_active
Description: Only active teams can be assigned sprint work.

Name: po_available_for_planning
Description: Product Owner must be available during sprint planning.

Name: sm_experienced_threshold
Description: Scrum Master experience should meet a minimum threshold.

Name: feature_status_ready
Description: Features scheduled must be in a 'ready' status.

Name: sprint_dates_valid
Description: Sprint end_date must be after start_date.

Name: release_has_planned_date
Description: Each release plan must include a planned date.

Name: doc_linked_to_feature
Description: Feature documentation must link to its feature.

Name: team_size_within_bounds
Description: Team size should remain within acceptable range.
